data.Name: Los Fugitivos
data.Bio: There are multiple bands with the name Los Fugitivos: 1) A late '60s garage rock band from Mexico. They released an LP entitled En La Esquina. 2) With their keyboard-driven Cumbias and airy pop sound, Los Fugitivos dominated the onda grupera scene of the '90s. Brothers Jaime and Edi Espinoza formed the band in 1985 as Grupo Kari√±o. But in 1991, with the addition singer/keyboardist Roberto Nieto, the band became Los Fugitivos. The band's first hits were covers Read more on Last.fm
